args_list: Tip: Go to the Hero Tavern to explore and recruit heroes
Tip: Heroes can be deployed on both sides of the enemy's path
Tip: Always pay attention to the [Enemy Capacity Indicator] at the top of the screen, which is the key to victory or defeat
Tip: Press and hold [TAP] to view friendly resource information
You can receive silver taels every once in a while, and you can get more silver taels rewards when you are [Purdue Sentient Beings].
After 30 seconds, the enemy is coming, so please be prepared
